dependent.message: This version of eaconfig requires osx_config with a revision higher than 1.14.00.3127898. This is needed because of the removal of the property eaconfig-eamconfig.transition from eaconfig.
This version of eaconfig requires ios_config with a revision higher than 1.05.00.3127622. This is needed because of the removal of the property eaconfig-eamconfig.transition from eaconfig.
This version of eaconfig requires EARunner-1.06.00 or higher or EARunner-dev at CL 953544 (package.EARunner.exe property definition)
Framework 8.00.00 or higher is required to work with this version of eaconfig. The config package loading setup is re-designed and required a new Framework/eaconfig pair.
This version of eaconfig requires at least DotNet 4.0 otherwise .NET reference directory will not be correctly setup.
This version of eaconfig requires FBConfig 1.06.00. A large amount of frostbite settings were removed from eaconfig and moved back to fbconfig.

package.changes: Please refer to the changelog for details.
